plantuml.notConfigured: PlantUML plugin is enabled but not properly configured.

mermaid.unknownError: Unknown rendering error. Please check your browser console.

createNote.question: Do you want to create a note with alias '{{aliasName}}'?

forbidden.title: Access denied
forbidden.description: You don't have the needed permission to access this note

getHistory.title: Load History Error
getHistory.text: While trying to load the history form the server an error occurred

deleteHistory.title: Delete History Error
deleteHistory.text: While trying to delete the history on the server an error occurred

setHistory.title: Upload History Error
setHistory.text: While trying to upload the history to the server an error occurred

deleteNote.title: Delete Note Error
deleteNote.text: While trying to delete a note on the server an error occurred

updateEntry.title: Update History Entry Error
updateEntry.text: While trying to update a history entry on the server an error occurred

deleteEntry.title: Delete History Entry Error
deleteEntry.text: While trying to delete a history entry on the server an error occurred

notFoundEntry.title: History Entry not found
notFoundEntry.text: We can't find the history entry you requested.

history.localHistory: Below is history from this browser

toolbar.uploadAll: Sync the complete history to the server

clearHistory.title: Delete history
clearHistory.question: Do you want to clear the history?

importHistoryError.title: An error occurred
importHistoryError.textWithFile: While trying to import history from '{{fileName}}' an error occurred.
importHistoryError.textWithoutFile: You did not provide any files to upload the history from.
importHistoryError.tooNewVersion: The file '{{fileName}}' comes from a newer client and can't be imported.

removeNote.title: Remove note from history
removeNote.question: Do you really want to remove this note from your history?
removeNote.warning: This just removes the history entry and won't delete the note itself.

versionInfo.issueTracker: Found a bug? Fill an issue!
versionInfo.title: Running HedgeDoc on version

profile.displayNameInfo: This name will be shown publicly on notes you created or edited.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.info: Your new password should contain at least 6 characters.
changePassword.failed: Changing your password failed. Check your old password and try again.
changePassword.successText: Your password has been changed successfully.

selectProfilePicture.title: Select profile picture
selectProfilePicture.info: Your profile picture is publicly visible. Depending on your auth provider, you might have more or less choices here.

profile.changeDisplayNameFailed: There was an error changing your display name.

accessTokens.title: Access tokens
accessTokens.info: Access tokens are an password-less authentication method for the CLI or third-party applications.
accessTokens.infoDev: Developers can use these to access the public API.
accessTokens.noTokens: You don't have any tokens generated yet.
accessTokens.label: Token label
accessTokens.loadingFailed: Fetching your access tokens has failed. Try reloading this page.

deleteUser.title: Delete user
deleteUser.message: Do you really want to delete your user account?
deleteUser.subMessage: This will delete your account, all notes that are owned by you and remove all references to your account from other notes.
deleteUser.failed: There was an error deleting your account. Please try it again or contact your instance's administrator.
deleteUser.notificationText: Your account has been successfully deleted.

addedAccessToken.title: Token added
addedAccessToken.message: The access token '{{label}}' was created. Copy it from the field below now, as you won't be able to view it again.

deleteAccessToken.title: Really delete token?
deleteAccessToken.message: When deleting the access token '{{label}}', the applications that used it won't have access to your account anymore. You eventually need a new token to continue using those applications.
deleteAccessToken.notificationText: The access token '{{label}}' has been deleted.
deleteAccessToken.failed: There was an error deleting the access token. Please try it again or contact your instance's administrator.

linter.sequence: The use of 'sequence' as code block language is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.
linter.shortcode: The {{shortcode}} short-code is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Use a single line URL instead.
linter.frontmatter-tags: The comma-separated definition of tags in the yaml-metadata is deprecated. Use a yaml-array instead.
linter.fork-awesome: The usage of Fork Awesome is deprecated and has been removed. Please use bootstrap icons instead. See {{link}} for more information.

upload.failed_size_too_large:
Error when uploading {{fileName}}.
File size exceeds the allowed limit

editor.placeholder:
← Start by entering a title here
===
Visit {{host}}cheatsheet if you don't know what to do.
Let the ideas grow :)
editor.infoToc: Structure your note with headings to see a table-of-contents here.

onlineStatus.inactive: This user has been inactive for some time

noPermission.title: No edit permission
noPermission.description: You don't have permission to edit this note. Please login and try again

locked.title: This note is locked
locked.description: Sorry, only the owner can edit this note.

limitReached.title: Reached the limit
limitReached.description: Sorry, this note reached its maximum length. Notes can be up to {{maxDocumentLength}} characters long.

incompatible.title: Your client's version is incompatible.
incompatible.description: The server requires a newer version of the editor.

newVersion.title: New version available!
newVersion.description: A new version of HedgeDoc is available

userStateChanged.title: Your user state has changed.
userStateChanged.description: Refresh to load new user state.

lengthTooltip.maximumReached: You've reached the maximum length of this note.
lengthTooltip.remaining: You may still write {{remaining}} characters until you reach the limit for this note.
lengthTooltip.exceeded: You've exceeded the maximum length of this note by {{exceeded}} characters. Consider shortening it.

common.title: Export to {{service}}
common.notificationSuccessMessage: The note has been exported to {{service}}.

gist.infoToken: You need a personal access token with the Gists account permission. You can create one in your GitHub settings here:

gitlab.infoToken: You need a personal access token with the api permission. You can create one in your GitLab user settings here:

mediaBrowser.title: Media
mediaBrowser.confirmDeletion: Do you really want to delete this file?
mediaBrowser.errorDeleting: The uploaded file could not be deleted.
mediaBrowser.mediaDeleted: The uploaded file has been deleted.
mediaBrowser.noMediaUploads: There are no media files uploaded to this note yet

revision.title: Revisions
revision.error: An error occurred while fetching the revisions of this note.
revision.errorUser: An error occurred while fetching the user information for this revision.

deleteRevision.title: Delete Revisions for current note
deleteRevision.question: Do you really want to remove all the previous revisions except the current of this note?
deleteRevision.warning: All the previous revisions except the current will be deleted for this note. This process is irreversible.
deleteRevision.error: An error occurred while deleting revisions of this note.

clipboardImport.title: Import from clipboard
clipboardImport.insertMarkdown: Paste your markdown or webpage here…

deleteNote.title: Delete note
deleteNote.question: Do you really want to delete this note?
deleteNote.warning: All users will lose their connection. This process is irreversible.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.editUser: Change {{name}}'s permissions to view and edit
permissions.editGroup: Change permissions of group "{{name}}" to view & edit
permissions.viewOnlyGroup: Change permissions of group "{{name}}" to view only
permissions.error: An error occurred while updating the permissions of this note.

ownerChange.error: There was an error changing the owner of this note.
ownerChange.placeholder: Enter username of new note owner
ownerChange.button: Change the owner of this note

permissions.inconsistent: This permission is overridden by another permission

shareLink.title: Share link
shareLink.editorDescription: This link points to this note in the editor as you currently see it.
shareLink.viewOnlyDescription: This link points to a read-only version of this note. You can use this e.g. for feedback from friends and colleagues.
shareLink.slidesDescription: This link points to the presentation view of the slides.

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.explanation: Aliases are alternative names for this note. You may access this note under all the listed names below.
aliases.errorAddingAlias: The chosen alias can not be added to this note
aliases.errorRemovingAlias: There was an error removing the alias
aliases.errorMakingPrimary: There was an error marking the alias as primary

abcJs.errorWhileRendering: Error while rendering your score. Please check if the code is correct.

common.errorWhileLoading:
An unexpected error occurred while loading '{{name}}'.
Check the browser console for more information.
Report this error only if it comes up again.

login.logoutFailed:
There was an error logging you out.
Close your browser window to ensure session data is removed.

guest.title: Continue as guest
guest.noteCreationDisabled: Guest note creation is disabled on this instance. Please log in to create a note.

error.other: There was an error logging you in.

register.question: No account yet?
register.title: Register
register.usernameInfo: The username is your unique identifier for login.
register.passwordInfo: Choose a unique and secure password.
register.infoTermsPrivacy: With the registration of my user account I agree to the following terms:

success.title: Successfully registered
success.message: Your account has been registered successfully. You can now log in with your username and password.

error.usernameExisting: There is already an account with this username.
error.other: There was an error while registering your account. Just try it again.

welcome.title: Welcome, {{name}}!
welcome.description: It seems this is the first time you logged in to this instance. Please confirm your information to continue and login. This needs to be done only once.
welcome.error: There was an error creating your user account. Please try again.
welcome.cancelError: There was an error with the process. If this persists, try to clear your cookies, reload and try again.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The requested page either does not exist or you don't have permission to access it.

noteCreationFailed.title: Note could not be created
noteCreationFailed.description: The note could not be created. Maybe you don't have permission to create notes.

noteDeleted.title: Note '{{noteTitle}}' deleted
noteDeleted.text: You were redirected to the history page, because the note you just edited was deleted.

ligatures.label: Ligatures
ligatures.help: Renders special character sequences as one symbol.

smartPaste.label: Smart Paste
smartPaste.help: Smart paste detects common formats (like tables) when pasting content into the editor and formats them as markdown.

syncScroll.label: Sync Scrolling
syncScroll.help: Synchronizes the scroll state of editor and rendering view.

lineWrapping.label: Line Wrapping
lineWrapping.help: Breaks long lines so they're visible without scrolling.

indentWithTabs.label: Indentation character
indentWithTabs.help: Sets which characters should be used for indentation

indentSpaces.label: Indentation size
indentSpaces.help: Sets the amount of spaces for indentation.

darkMode.label: Dark mode
darkMode.help: Enforces the use of the dark mode for the app or lets the browser decide.

modal.title: Cheatsheet
modal.noSelection: Select an entry on the left side to show the instructions.

basicFormatting.title: Basic
basicFormatting.description: These are the basic markdown formatting rules.

abbreviation.title: Abbreviation
abbreviation.description: Abbreviation definitions create tooltips for matching words. They can be placed defined in the document.
abbreviation.example:
*[HTML]: Hyper Text Markup Language
*[W3C]:  World Wide Web Consortium
The HTML specification
is maintained by the W3C.

footnote.title: Footnotes
footnote.description: Footnotes can be used to add extra information at the bottom of the page. They can be defined anywhere in the document.
footnote.example:
Here is a footnote reference,[^1] and another.[^longnote]

[^1]: Here is the footnote.

[^longnote]: Here's one with multiple blocks. Subsequent paragraphs are indented to show that they belong to the previous footnote.

hashtag.title: Hashtag
hashtag.description: Headlines can be used to structure your document into sections. Every headline creates a linkable anchor.
hashtag.example:
# Headline 1

## Headline 2

### Headline 3

#### Headline 4

##### Headline 5

###### Headline 6

equal.title: Equals sign
equal.description: An alternative form for the first and second level headline is to append a line of only equals signs or dashes after the headline text.

inline.title: Inline
inline.description: You can define an inline code block by wrapping it in backticks.

block.title: Block
block.description:
You can define a code block by putting a line of three backticks before and after the code part.

It is also possible to define a language for syntax highlighting. For more information check the entry "Other > Code Highlighting"

unordered.title: Unordered
unordered.description: You can create unordered lists by prepending lines with dashes or asterisks.
unordered.example:
- A
- B
- C

* A
* B
* C

ordered.title: Ordered
ordered.description: You can create ordered lists by prepending lines with numbers followed by a dot. Ordered lists will always start with one. Ordered lists that aren't separated by another element will continue the last list.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Images can be defined using the link syntax with an exclamation mark in front of it. The text in the brackets will be used as alt-text.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size syntax allows you to set both dimensions of an image. If you omit one of the dimensions then image will be scaled to the relative size.

links.title: Links
links.description: You can create text links by either using the link syntax, by writing the plain URL or by writing it in angle brackets.

abcjs.title: abcjs
abcjs.description: You can render music sheets with abcjs by using music standard notation in a codeblock with `abc` as language.
abcjs.example:
```abc
X:1
T:Speed the Plough
M:4/4
C:Trad.
K:G
|:GABc dedB|dedB dedB|c2ec B2dB|c2A2 A2BA|
GABc dedB|dedB dedB|c2ec B2dB|A2F2 G4:|
|:g2gf gdBd|g2f2 e2d2|c2ec B2dB|c2A2 A2df|
g2gf g2Bd|g2f2 e2d2|c2ec B2dB|A2F2 G4:|
```

alert.title: Alert boxes
alert.description: Use alert boxes to bring extra attention to parts of your document.
alert.example:
:::success
This is a success
:::

:::danger
This is a danger
:::

:::warning
This is a warning
:::

:::info
This is a info
:::

name.title: Name
name.description: Use name tags to indicate who wrote a specific quote e.g. if you're commenting on the text.
name.example:
> Imagination is more important than knowledge.
> [name=Albert Einstein]

color.title: Color
color.description: Use color tags to tint the border of the quote.
color.example:
> This is the default color

> This is red! [color=red]

> This is blue! [color=#0000ff]

time.title: Time
time.description: Use time tags to specify when a time stamp
time.example:
The password is: changeme

> Please change it ASAP [time=2020-03-05]

blockquoteTags.title: Blockquote Tags
blockquoteTags.description: Use name, time or color tags to specify your blockquotes. Color tags modify the border color.
blockquoteTags.example:
> [name=Max] Named quote

> [time=today] Time quote

> [color=red] quote

> [name=Max] [color=green] [time=today] Combined quote

bootstrapIcon.title: Bootstrap Icons
bootstrapIcon.description: You can use bootstrap icons in your document by putting the name of an icon between colons but prefixed with `bi-`. A listing of all bootstrap icons can be found on their website.
bootstrapIcon.example:
:bi-music-note-beamed::bi-music-note-beamed::bi-music-note-beamed:
Around the :bi-globe-americas:
Around the :bi-globe-asia-australia:
Around the :bi-globe-central-south-asia:
Around the :bi-globe-europe-africa:

emoji.title: Emojis
emoji.description: You can add colored emojis by either placing the unicode character or by using a shortcode. HedgeDoc supports every emoji that Twemoji supports. You can also use the emoji picker in the editor toolbar.

table.title: Table
table.description: You can render a CSV text as table by using a code block with `csv` as language. You must specify the delimiter.
table.example:
```csv delimiter=;
Username; Identifier;First name;Last name
"booker12; rbooker";9012;Rachel;Booker
grey07;2070;Laura;Grey
johnson81;4081;Craig;Johnson
jenkins46;9346;Mary;Jenkins
smith79;5079;Jamie;Smith
```

header.title: Header
header.description: By adding the header keyword you can define that the first line is used as table header
header.example:
```csv delimiter=; header
Username; Identifier;First name;Last name
"booker12; rbooker";9012;Rachel;Booker
grey07;2070;Laura;Grey
johnson81;4081;Craig;Johnson
jenkins46;9346;Mary;Jenkins
smith79;5079;Jamie;Smith
```

flowchart.title: flowchart.js
flowchart.description: Render flowcharts diagrams using flowchart.js by using a code block with `flow` as language.
flowchart.example:
```flow
st=>start: Start
e=>end: End
op=>operation: My Operation
op2=>operation: lalala
cond=>condition: Yes or No?

st->op->op2->cond
cond(yes)->e
cond(no)->op2
```

gist.title: GitHub Gist
gist.description: Embed GitHub Gists by placing a gist URL on a single line.
gist.example:
# This is my gist
https://gist.github.com/schacon/1
This is just the link to a gist: https://gist.github.com/schacon/1
[Using the link tag will also not trigger the embedding](https://gist.github.com/schacon/1)

graphviz.title: GraphViz
graphviz.description: Render GraphViz diagrams by using the DOT language in a code block with `graphviz` as language.
graphviz.example:
```graphviz
graph {
  a -- b
  a -- b
  b -- a [color=blue]
}
```

katex.title: KaTeX
katex.description: You can render LaTeX mathematical expressions using KaTeX by encapsulating them in dollar signs.
katex.example:
The *Gamma function* satisfying $\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!\quad\forall n\in\mathbb N$ is via the Euler integral

$$
x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.
$$

$$
\Gamma(z) = \int_0^\infty t^{z-1}e^{-t}dt\,.
$$

asciinema.title: Asciinema
asciinema.description: Embed an Asciinema video by placing the URL in a single line.

mermaid.title: Mermaid
mermaid.description: Render diagrams and charts using mermaid.js by adding a code block with the language `mermaid`
mermaid.example:
```mermaid
gantt
  title A Gantt Diagram

  section Section
  A task: a1, 2014-01-01, 30d
  Another task: after a1, 20d

  section Another
  Task in sec: 2014-01-12, 12d
  Another task: 24d
```

imagePlaceholder.title: Image Placeholder
imagePlaceholder.description: You can use image placeholders to indicate spots where images should be placed. To do this use an image link with `https://` as URL. You can upload the actual image directly from the renderer. Placeholders also support size definition, alt text and title.

iframeCapsule.title: Iframe capsule
iframeCapsule.description: To protect viewers every iframe has to be activated explicitly. Before this, no information is fetched. Adding additional privileges using the sandbox attribute is not allowed.

plantuml.title: PlantUML
plantuml.description: Render diagrams and charts using PlantUML by adding a code block with the language `plantuml`. PlantUML diagrams are not rendered in your browser like the other charts, but by an external server.
plantuml.example: ```plantuml @startuml participant Alice participant "The **Famous** Bob" as Bob Alice -> Bob : hello --there-- ... Some ~~long delay~~ ... Bob -> Alice : ok note left This is **bold** This is //italics// This is ""monospaced"" This is --stroked-- This is __underlined__ This is ~~waved~~ end note Alice -> Bob : A //well formatted// message note right of Alice This is displayed __left of__ Alice. end note note left of Bob This is displayed **left of Alice Bob**. end note note over Alice, Bob This is hosted by end note @enduml ```

spoiler.title: Spoiler
spoiler.description: Hide information by using a spoiler tag.
spoiler.example:
:::spoiler This spoiler contains a surprise.
SURPRISE!
:::

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Add a table of contents that is automatically generated using your headlines by adding `[toc]` into a single line.
basic.example:
[toc]

# This is a first headline

## This is a second headline

levelLimit.title: Level limits
levelLimit.description: You can limit the levels of the headlines the TOC should show
levelLimit.example:
[toc:2:3]

# This is a first headline

## This is a second headline

### This is a third headline

#### This is a fourth headline

vegaLite.title: Vega Lite
vegaLite.description: Render diagrams and charts using vega lite by adding a code block with the language `vega-lite`

vimeo.title: Vimeo
vimeo.description: Embed a Vimeo video by placing the URL in a single line.

youtube.title: YouTube
youtube.description: Embed a YouTube video by placing the URL in a single line.

taskList.title: Task Lists
taskList.description: You can turn any listing into a task list by adding brackets. The checkboxes in the rendering change the markdown content if clicked.
taskList.example:
- [ ] ToDos
  - [X] Buy some salad
  - [ ] Brush teeth
  - [x] Drink some water
  - [ ] **Click my box** and see the source code, if you're allowed to edit!

language.title: Language
language.description: Specify a language after the start tag of a code block to activate code highlighting.

lineWrapping.title: Line wrapping
lineWrapping.description: Set an exclamation mark to activate line wrapping

lineNumbers.title: Line numbers
lineNumbers.description: Set a equals sign after the language to show line numbers. You can specify a start line number after the equal sign or a plus to continue the line numbers from the last code block.

warning.title: Warning!
warning.text: To print this note, please use the print button in the export menu in the sidebar. Printing this page directly will not work as expected.
